task.title: Installing your package in TAFC
task.shortdesc: This task describes how to install the generated tar file on your TAFC environment.

taskbody.prereq: You must already have generated your package from the packager. Please refer to the section
taskbody.context: This task refers to TAFC installation procedure that is prone to change. Please refer to TAFC documentation for more details.

step.cmd: Copy the tar file to the appropriate TAFC location. for instance: [TAFCInstallation]\Temenos\bnk\bnk.run\package
Make sure jsh is available. (run setup.bat)
Execute the appropriate command to install the package. for instance: jsh -c T24PackageInstaller

taskbody.result: Your changes are installed on the TAFC environment.
